body: Submerged in shallow water or hidden in tangles of rushes, lizardfolk rangers give away their position only once it is too late for their prey to do anything about it.
name: Lizardfolk Rangers

sections.other_gear: mwk leather armor, mwk longbow with 20 arrows, fishing net, 29 gp.
sections.feats: Improved Natural Attack (claw), Multiattack, Point-Blank Shot

sections.body: During Combat The stalker prefers to soften up lightly armored targets with his longbow before moving in for the kill.
sections.name: Tactics
Lizardfolk Stalker
sections.skills: Acrobatics +5, Knowledge (nature) +4, Perception +8, Survival +6, Stealth +7, Swim +16
sections.combat_gear: potion of barkskin, potions of cure moderate wounds (2), antitoxins (2), smokestick, tanglefoot bag

sections.special_attacks: combat style (natural weapon), favored enemy (humans +4, reptilian humanoids +2)
sections.other_gear: +1 studded leather, +1 composite longbow (+4 Str) with 30 arrows, fishing net, 55 gp
sections.feats: Aquatic Adaption*, Dangerous Tail*, Endurance, Improved Initiative, Improved Natural Attack (claw), Point-Blank Shot, Swift Swimmer*, Weapon Focus (claw)
sections.special_qualities: favored terrain (swamp +2), hold breath, hunter's bond (companions), track +3, wild empathy +6, woodland stride
sections.name: Lizardfolk Swamp Lurker
sections.skills: Acrobatics +5, Climb +14, Handle Animal +3, Heal +6, Knowledge (nature) +6, Perception +12, Stealth +11, Survival +12, Swim +19
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Lizardfolk/Example Lizardfolk/Lizardfolk Rangers/Lizardfolk Swamp Lurker
